title: The One Where the Monkey Gets Away

questions.question: What tea flavors does Rachel list to a customer at Central Perk?
options: Earl Grey, English Breakfast, and Cinnamon Stick
Cinnamon Stick, Camomile, Mint Medley, and Blackberry
Earl Grey, English Breakfast, Cinnamon Stick, Camomile, Mint Medley, Blackberry, and Lemon Soother
Mint Medley, Blackberry, Lemon Soother, and English Breakfast
questions.correct_answer: Earl Grey, English Breakfast, Cinnamon Stick, Camomile, Mint Medley, Blackberry, and Lemon Soother
questions.explanation: Rachel lists the tea flavors available to a customer.

questions.question: What is the name of the man Rachel almost married?
questions.explanation: Monica mentions that Barry is the man Rachel almost married.

questions.question: What does Ross ask Marcel to bring him?
questions.explanation: Ross asks Marcel to bring him the rice while they are eating Chinese food.

questions.question: What type of monkey is Marcel?
questions.explanation: Rachel describes Marcel as a black capuchin monkey with a white face when talking to Animal Control.

questions.question: Why does Ross go to pick up a bottle of wine?
options: To drink with the guys at Joe-G's Pizza
To have a party at his apartment
questions.explanation: Ross plans to pick up wine and go to Rachel's apartment to try to woo her.

questions.question: What does Marcel do in Monica's shoe?
questions.explanation: Marcel poops in Monica's shoe, which Rachel then uses to get rid of the engagement newsletter.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman from Rachel and Monica's high school?
questions.explanation: Luisa Gianetti is the woman from Rachel and Monica's high school who now works for Animal Control.

questions.question: Why does Ross not want Animal Control to find Marcel?
options: Because Marcel is an illegal exotic animal
questions.correct_answer: Because Marcel is an illegal exotic animal
questions.explanation: Ross tells Rachel that Marcel is an illegal exotic animal and that Animal Control will take him away if they find him.

questions.question: What is Mr. Heckles using the bananas for?
questions.explanation: Mr. Heckles claims he needs the bananas for potassium.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe jump towards Marcel when Luisa fires the tranquilizer gun?
questions.explanation: Phoebe jumps towards Marcel to save him from being tranquilized by Luisa.

questions.question: What does Rachel offer to do to make up for losing Marcel?
questions.explanation: Rachel offers to break her foot to make up for losing Marcel, and then actually kicks a sign and hurts her foot.

questions.question: What is Ross's excuse for why he and Rachel should drink the wine at home?
questions.explanation: Ross turns off the main light and claims the neighbors must be vacuuming to create a romantic atmosphere.

questions.question: Who bursts into Rachel's apartment near the end of the episode?
questions.explanation: Barry bursts into Rachel's apartment and says he cannot marry Mindy because he is still in love with Rachel.

questions.question: What is the name of the school that Rachel, Monica, and Luisa attended?
questions.explanation: Luisa mentions that she sat behind Rachel and Monica in home room at Lincoln High.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when her butt cheek wakes up?
questions.explanation: Phoebe stands up and starts dancing around when her butt cheek wakes up after being tranquilized.

questions.question: What type of school did Chandler attend?
questions.explanation: Chandler mentions that he attended boarding school with four hundred boys.

questions.question: What does Rachel list as the tea flavors available at Central Perk, in order?
options: Earl Grey, English Breakfast, Cinnamon Stick, Camomile, Mint Medley, Blackberry, Lemon Soother
Earl Grey, English Breakfast, Camomile, Cinnamon Stick, Mint Medley, Blackberry, Lemon Soother
Cinnamon Stick, Camomile, Mint Medley, Blackberry, Earl Grey, English Breakfast, Lemon Soother
Mint Medley, Blackberry, Lemon Soother, English Breakfast, Earl Grey, Cinnamon Stick, Camomile
questions.correct_answer: Earl Grey, English Breakfast, Cinnamon Stick, Camomile, Mint Medley, Blackberry, Lemon Soother
questions.explanation: Rachel lists the tea flavors in this order when talking to a customer at Central Perk.

questions.question: What is the name of the play that Monica was in during high school?
questions.explanation: Monica shows her high school yearbook to the gang and points out her role in The Sound of Music.

questions.question: What does Joey claim he can do to help the sweaty women?
questions.explanation: Joey claims he can fix the women's radiator, but then admits he doesn't actually know how.

questions.question: What does Luisa use to try to sedate Marcel?
options: A gun with a tranquilizer dart
questions.correct_answer: A gun with a tranquilizer dart
questions.explanation: Luisa uses a gun with a tranquilizer dart to try to sedate Marcel in the basement.

questions.question: What does Rachel tell Luisa she will do if she takes Marcel away?
questions.explanation: Rachel threatens to call Luisa's supervisor if she takes Marcel away, mentioning that Luisa shot Phoebe in the butt with a tranquilizer dart.

questions.question: What is the name of the animal that Ross says he should have started Rachel with instead of a monkey?
questions.explanation: Ross says he should have started Rachel with a pen or a pencil instead of a monkey.

questions.question: What does Mr. Heckles claim the monkey's name is?
questions.explanation: Mr. Heckles claims that the monkey's name is Patti, and that the dress Marcel is wearing belongs to him.

questions.question: What is the reason for Rachel's emotional reaction to Barry and Mindy's engagement?
options: She is still in love with Barry
She is upset because she is not married yet
questions.correct_answer: She is still in love with Barry
questions.explanation: Rachel is emotional about Barry and Mindy's engagement because she still has feelings for Barry.

questions.question: What does Chandler say Ross should do instead of trying to woo Rachel with wine?
options: Take her to the Russian Tea Room
questions.explanation: Chandler jokes that Ross should take Rachel back to the 1890s, implying that the phrase 'try to woo her' is outdated.

questions.question: What is the name of the pizza place where the guys are hanging out?
questions.explanation: The guys are hanging out at Joe-G's Pizza when they discuss Ross's plan to woo Rachel.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when she notices the tranquilizer dart in her butt?
questions.explanation: Phoebe notices the tranquilizer dart in her butt and pulls it out.

questions.question: What does Ross say he wants to do with the bottle of wine?
options: Give it to Rachel as a gift
Save it for a special occasion
questions.explanation: Ross wants to drink the wine at home with Rachel, but she suggests going to Newark instead.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's broken foot?
questions.explanation: Ross kicks a sign in frustration and breaks his foot.

questions.question: What does Rachel say she will do if Luisa takes Marcel away?
options: She will report Luisa to the authorities
She will give Luisa the dress
questions.explanation: Rachel threatens to call Luisa's supervisor if she takes Marcel away.

questions.question: What does Mr. Heckles claim the bananas are for?
questions.explanation: Mr. Heckles claims he needs the bananas for potassium.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when she feels her butt cheek waking up?
questions.explanation: Phoebe starts dancing when she feels her butt cheek waking up after being tranquilized.
